Item.method_code:
Dim i as integer for i=0 to Me.getItemCount()-1 Dim itm as Item = Me.getItemByIndex(i) if (itm.getProperty("relationship_select_properties","") = "") then itm.setProperty("relationship_select_properties","sort_order,config_id,related_id")
if (itm.getProperty("related_item_select_properties","") = "") then itm.setProperty("related_item_select_properties","id,generation,config_id,major_rev,classification,created_by_id(keyed_name),owned_by_id(keyed_name),managed_by_id(keyed_name),team_id(keyed_name),current_state(label),state,locked_by_id(keyed_name)")
next i return Me
Item.name: tgc_RelMapping Defaults
